description: Series IX.B contains balance ledgers and tax documents related to Szeemann’s personal and professional finances. Rehoused binders and ledger books originally labeled “Abschluss” have been changed to “Balance,” while materials labeled "Steuern" are now “Taxes.” Records within each section are arranged chronologically.
label: Taxes and balances, Series IX.B.

metadata.value: The arrangement of this subseries is based on type of materials, followed by chronological year.
metadata.label: Arrangement
